column4: I'm trying to set the NTP time on my LTSP thin client servers to match up with our time server here at work. But it's not pulling the correct time. Some do, some don't. It's not a solid 100% are right or 100% are wrong. Where can I go with this?
if the skew is too much ntp wont even try; you need to kick it to something close with ntpdate or something
uh, what? where do I run ntpdate? on my servers or the clients or what?
the client, it's usually ran once at boot time
